snippet: Advocates for the bill said it would limit a practice that they say disproportionately affects the ability of blacks and Hispanics to get hired.
abstract: New York City Council votes 47-to-3 to approve ban prohibiting employers from using credit checks to screen job applicants; advocates say credit checks disproportionately affect blacks and Hispanics.
lead_paragraph: Advocates for the bill said it would limit a practice that they say disproportionately affects the ability of blacks and Hispanics to get hired.

headline.main: New York City Council Votes to Restrict Credit Checks in Hiring
headline.print_headline: Council Votes to Restrict Credit Checks in Hiring
